import pandas as pd

# read the csv file from staging
df_raw = spark.read.csv(
    "abfss://group3fpfilesystem@group3fpadls.dfs.core.windows.net/staging/norway_medicine.csv",
    header=True, inferSchema=True
)

# convert to pandas
df = df_raw.toPandas()

# keep only the columns we care about

df_long = df[df['Valuegender'] == 'Both sexes'][['Valuetime','Valuedrug','SumSum_DDD', 'SumAntall_unike_pasienter']]
# sort based on time, gender, atc-code
df_long = df_long.sort_values(by=['Valuetime', 'Valuedrug']).reset_index(drop=True)

#Change column names to our standardized names
df_long = df_long.rename(columns={
    'Valuetime': 'year',  
    'Valuedrug':'atc_level_5', 
    'SumSum_DDD': 'expedited_ddd', 
    'SumAntall_unike_pasienter': 'users'
})
#print(df_long.count())
#df_long.head(900)

#convert into spark df and store in our standardized folder
spark_df = spark.createDataFrame(df_long)
output_path = "abfss://group3fpfilesystem@group3fpadls.dfs.core.windows.net/standardized/norway_medicine.parquet"
spark_df.write.mode("overwrite").parquet(output_path)
